root.name: Panic Restaurant
root.description: Panic at the Restaurant Title screen. Panic Restaurant is an NES platformer released by Taito. It is a 2D sidescroller with a food theme. It was released late in the NES's life and is thus one of the rarer games on the system. Plot Ohdove's parasol express. All is going well for a Chef named Cookie when a rival chef named Ohdove steals away Cookie's restaurant. To get it back, Cookie must battle hordes of sentient carrots, kabobs, hot dogs, and other food items. Gameplay PIZZA TIME To crush the cavalcades of culinary critters, Cookie cooks up a cacophony of carnage with his chef tools of the trade, including a frying pan, spoon, fork, and dishes.
